span.strong:
IMPORTANT INFORMATION REGARDING MEAL PICK UP
STARTING APRIL 13thÂ

div.p: Beginning onÂ Monday April 13thÂ we will be changing the way youÂ pickupÂ meals for your children. We will only have meal pickups on MondaysÂ and Wednesdays. We have reduced our serving days from 5 to 2Â in an effort to increaseÂ our social distancing. This change is to help protect the families and our staff from COVID 19.
Monday we will have a hot lunch toÂ pickupÂ with a cold breakfast but in addition, you will also pick up a cold lunch for Tuesday with one additional breakfast.
Wednesday we will have a hot lunch to pickÂ up with a cold breakfast but in addition, you will also pick up a cold lunch for Thursday and a cold lunch for Friday with two additional breakfasts.
AllÂ locations, both school andÂ mobile feeding sitesÂ will only distribute meals on MondaysÂ and Wednesdays.Â

In an effort to help maintain proper social distancing, if possible please haveÂ eitherÂ your front passenger seat emptyÂ or have your trunk open as a place for us to put the meals. This way our staff and volunteers can better maintain the recommended amount of spacing for your safety and theirs.
**For those families that walk, ride bikes, etc., it would be a great idea to bringÂ a wayÂ to carry the multiple days mealsÂ ie.-wagon, basket, backpack.Â
We are hoping by allowing families to pickÂ up meals for multiple days this will help limit the risk of exposure for both families and our staff.
Please watch for continuous information on our web page and Facebook.
Â
INFORMACIÃN IMPORTANTE PARA BUSCAR LAS COMIDAS
A PARTIR DEL 13 DE ABRILÂ

A partir del lunes 13 de abril, vamos a cambiar la forma que usted busca las comidas para sus niÃ±os.Â SÃ³lo tendremos comida para recoger los dÃ­as lunes y miÃ©rcoles.Â Hemos reducido nuestros dÃ­as de servicios de 5 a 2 con el fin de reducir en contacto social. Este cambio es para ayudar a proteger a las familias y a nuestro personal del COVID-19.
Los lunes tendremos el almuerzo caliente y desayuno y ademÃ¡s usted tambiÃ©n podrÃ¡ llevarse el almuerzo para el martes con su respectivo desayuno.
LosÂ miÃ©rcolesÂ tendremos el almuerzo caliente y desayuno y ademÃ¡s usted tambiÃ©n podrÃ¡ llevarse los almuerzos y los desayunos para el jueves y el viernes.
Todas lasÂ instalaciones, tanto la escuela como en los otros lugares de alimentaciÃ³n, sÃ³lo distribuirÃ¡n comidas los lunes y los miÃ©rcoles.

En un esfuerzo para prevenir el contacto social, si es posible por favor tenga el puesto del pasajero del auto vacÃ­o o tenga la cajuela o la maletera del auto abierta para que nosotros podamos poner las comidas. De esta manera nuestro personal y voluntarios pueden mantener la distancia recomendada para su seguridad y la de nosotros.Â
**Para las familias que caminan, llegan en bicicleta, etc. serÃ­a buena idea traer una cesta, una mochila o un vagÃ³n para poner las comidas.
Esperamos que permitiÃ©ndoles a las familias buscar las comidas para varios dÃ­as ayudarÃ¡ a minimizar el riesgo de exposiciÃ³n tanto de las familias como de nuestro personal.Â
Por favor este pendiente de la informaciÃ³n publicada en nuestra pÃ¡gina en internet y en Facebook.Â
Â

b.u: IMPORTANT INFORMATION REGARDING MEAL PICK UP

hr.p: Beginning on Thursday April 2nd we will be allowing parents or guardians to pick up a meal permit for their childrenâs meals.Â This meal permit will allow a parent to pick up the number of meals on your permit without your children needing to be in the car.Â Beginning April 2nd the number given on the permit will be based on the number of children in the vehicle when the permit is issued.Â This means in order for all children in your household to receive a meal you must bring all of them on the day you pick up your permit.Â Once you receive your permit then you will just need to have the permit hanging on your rear view mirror in order to receive meals.Â You are still welcome to bring your children with you as we do enjoy seeing them.

A partir del jueves 2 de abril permitiremos que los padres o representantes puedan recoger un permiso para la comida de los niÃ±os. Este permiso para la comida autorizarÃ¡ a los padres o representantes de buscar la comida sin necesidad que los niÃ±os estÃ©n en el auto. El permiso serÃ¡ repartido durante la semana del 2 abril y el nÃºmero que estarÃ¡ en el permiso corresponderÃ¡ al nÃºmero de niÃ±os que estÃ©n en el vehÃ­culo cuando los permisos sean emitidos. Esto significa que para que todos los niÃ±os de la casa reciban comida, usted debe traerlos a todos el dÃ­a que busque su permiso. Una vez que ya tenga el permiso, solamente necesitarÃ¡ poner el permiso en el espejo retrovisor del auto para poder recibir las comidas. Esperamos que permitiÃ©ndoles a las familias buscar las comidas sin los niÃ±os ayudarÃ¡ a reducir la posibilidad de riesgo tanto para las familias como para el personal. Igual, si desea traer a los niÃ±os con usted lo puede hacer. Â¡Disfrutamos verlos venir!

School Sites will be serving a hot to go lunches with a cold breakfast for the next day at the locations listed below from 11:30-12:30 at no cost for any child ages 1-18 regardless of if they are typically free, reduced or full pay. We are planning on a curb side pickup in an effort to reduce social contact.

ul.li: Bluemont Elementary pickup will be on the west side of the building
Lee Elementary School pickup will be in the front of the building
Northview Elementary School pickup will be in the front of the building
Ogden Elementary pickup will be in the front of the building
Theodore Roosevelt Elementary School pickup will be on the east side of the building
Woodrow Wilson Elementary pickup will be on the north side of the building

hr.p: We will also have cold sack lunches with the next days breakfast available for children to pick up in the following locations from 11:30-12:30 at no cost for any child ages 1-18 regardless of if they are typically free, reduced or full pay. We are planning on a curb side pickup in an effort to reduce social contact.

ul.li: Colonial Gardens Mobile Home Park, 3000 Tuttle Creek Blvd
Flint Hills Place Apartments 1300 Flint Hills Place, at the corner of Manhattan Ave. and Kimball Ave.
Riverchase Mobile Home Park, 4440 Tuttle Creek Blvd
Tuttle Cove - 3031-3199 Freeman Circle (in the cul-de-sac) - new site starting April 6
Baehr Apartments - 1321 Baehr Pl. - new site starting April 6

hr.p: Two more sites have been addedÂ - Hillside Apartments on Dondee Dr, and Flint Hills Place at the corner of Manhattan and Kimball.
There is an interactive map available that shows the meal pickup locations.
Our Child Nutrition Department served 962 children on Tuesday, March 17!

Riverchase Mobile Home Park ,4440 Tuttle Creek Blvd, is now approved as a feeding site! This will change meal pick up time at Colonial Gardens to 11:30-12:00. Riverchase meal time will be 12:15-12:45.

Child Nutrition will begin serving sack lunches with the next dayâs breakfast available for children to pick up in Riverchase from 12:15-12:45 in addition to all previous locations listed. We will begin feeding on Wednesday, March 18th next to the mailboxes. These meals are free for anyone ages 1-18 the child must be present at pickup.
We are working with Kansas State Department of Education on adding more locations.
hr.hr:
Beginning on Monday March 16 from 11:30-12:30 we will serve hot to go lunches with a cold breakfast for the next day at the following locations free for any child ages 1-18 regardless of if they are typically free, reduced or full pay. We are planning on a curb side pickup in an effort to reduce social contact but any child wishing to receive a meal will need to be present per federal regulations
Bluemont Elementary pickup will be on the west side of the building
Lee Elementary School pickup will be in the front of the building
Northview Elementary School pickup will be in the front of the building
Ogden Elementary pickup will be in the front of the building
Theodore Roosevelt Elementary School pickup will be on the east side of the building
Woodrow Wilson Elementary pickup will be on the north side of the building
We will also have cold sack lunches with the next days breakfast available for children to pick up in the Colonial Gardens Mobile Home Park from 11:30-Noon.
Cold sack lunches with the next days breakfast will be available for children to pick up in the Redbud Estates near the main office building from 11:30-12:30.
Meals will be provided Monday- Friday from March 16-27.
We will update if there are any changes. Please be patient with staff when picking up meals as we will do our best to get people in and out as quickly as possible.
Â

div.a: Manhattan-Ogden USD 383 -- 2031 Poyntz Ave, Manhattan, KS 66502
